s0051.literal: Followed in attacking Xiang Yu, massacred Zhujiao.
s0051.idiomatic: He followed Gaozu in attacking Xiang Yu, massacring the defenders at Zhujiao.

s0052.chinese: 擊破王武、程處軍於外黃。
s0052.literal: Defeated Wang Wu and Cheng Chu's army at Waihuang.
s0052.idiomatic: He smashed Wang Wu and Cheng Chu's forces at Waihuang.

s0053.idiomatic: He attacked the cities of Zou, Lu, Xiaqiu, and Xue.

s0054.chinese: 項羽敗漢王於彭城，盡復取魯、梁地。
s0054.literal: Xiang Yu defeated Han King at Pengcheng, completely recaptured Lu and Liang territory.
s0054.idiomatic: Xiang Yu defeated the Han King at Pengcheng and completely regained control of Lu and Liang territories.

s0055.chinese: 噲還至滎陽，益食平陰二千戶，以將軍守廣武。
s0055.literal: Kuai returned to Xingyang, additionally granted Pingyin two thousand households, as general guarding Guangwu.
s0055.idiomatic: Fan Kuai returned to Xingyang. He was additionally granted two thousand households in Pingyin and appointed general to defend Guangwu.

s0056.literal: One year, Xiang Yu led troops and went east.
s0056.idiomatic: After one year, Xiang Yu led his troops eastward.

s0057.chinese: 從高祖擊項籍，下陽夏，虜楚周將軍卒四千人。
s0057.literal: Followed Gaozu attacking Xiang Yu, took Yangxia, captured Chu Zhou general's troops four thousand.
s0057.idiomatic: He followed Gaozu in attacking Xiang Yu, capturing Yangxia and taking four thousand troops from the Chu general Zhou.

s0058.literal: Surrounded Xiang Yu at Chen, greatly defeated him.
s0058.idiomatic: He surrounded Xiang Yu at Chen and dealt him a crushing defeat.

s0059.idiomatic: He massacred the defenders at Hul陵.

s0060.chinese: 項籍既死，漢王為帝，以噲堅守戰有功，益食八百戶。
s0060.literal: Xiang Yu already dead, Han King became emperor, because Kuai firmly defended and fought with merit, additionally granted eight hundred households.
s0060.idiomatic: After Xiang Yu's death, the Han King became emperor. For Fan Kuai's steadfast defense and meritorious service in battle, he was additionally granted eight hundred households.

s0061.chinese: 從高帝攻反燕王臧荼，虜荼，定燕地。
s0061.literal: 從高祖攻反寇燕王臧荼於薊，破之。
s0061.idiomatic: He followed Gaozu in attacking the rebel Yan King Zang Tu at Ji, defeating him.

s0062.chinese: 楚王韓信反，噲從至陳，取信，定楚。
s0062.literal: 又從至陳，取楚王信，剖符，世世勿絕。
s0062.idiomatic: He followed again to Chen, captured Chu King Xin, and received an enfeoffment document guaranteeing his title for generations without end.

s0063.chinese: 更賜爵列侯，與諸侯剖符，世世勿絕，食舞陽，號為舞陽侯，除前所食。
s0063.idiomatic: He was granted Wuyang as his fief and given the title Left General.

s0064.chinese: 以將軍從高祖攻反韓王信於代。
s0064.literal: 明年，定翟，伐陳豨，當陳豨連戰。
s0064.idiomatic: The next year, he pacified Di and attacked Chen Xi, fighting continuous battles against Chen Xi.

s0065.chinese: 自霍人以往至雲中，與絳侯等共定之，益食千五百戶。
s0065.literal: 陳豨敗，與曼丘臣遊擊於代。
s0065.idiomatic: Chen Xi was defeated, and Fan Kuai conducted mobile warfare with Manqiu Chen in Dai.

s0066.chinese: 因擊陳豨與曼丘臣軍，戰襄國，破柏人，先登，降定清河、常山凡二十七縣，殘東垣，遷為左丞相。
s0066.literal: 高祖南御馮異等絕隴道，攻雍，定隴西。
s0066.idiomatic: Gaozu marched south to intercept Feng Yi and others on the Long road, attacked Yong, and pacified Longxi.

s0067.chinese: 破得綦毋卹、尹潘軍於無終、廣昌。
s0067.literal: 以所將到故關與新安軍，益爵，宜至丞相。
s0067.idiomatic: With the troops he commanded, he reached Guguan and the Xinan army. His nobility rank was increased, making him eligible for the position of chancellor.

s0068.chinese: 破豨別將胡人王黃軍於代南，因擊韓信軍於參合。
s0068.idiomatic: This is recorded in the Hereditary House of Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo.

s0069.chinese: 軍所將卒斬韓信，破豨胡騎橫谷，斬將軍趙既，虜代丞相馮梁、守孫奮、大將王黃、將軍、（太卜）太仆解福等十人。
s0069.literal: 項籍之叛楚也，淮陰人韓信亡楚歸漢。
s0069.idiomatic: When Xiang Yu rebelled against Chu, Han Xin from Huaiyin fled from Chu to join Han.

s0070.chinese: 與諸將共定代鄉邑七十三。
s0070.literal: 漢王授信為治粟都尉，未之奇也。
s0070.idiomatic: The Han King appointed Han Xin as grain commissioner, but did not consider him exceptional.

s0071.chinese: 其後燕王盧綰反，噲以相國擊盧綰，破其丞相抵薊南，定燕地，凡縣十八，鄉邑五十一。
s0071.literal: 信數與蕭何語，何奇之，至南鄭。
s0071.idiomatic: Han Xin often spoke with Xiao He, who recognized his talent. This continued until they reached Nanzheng.

s0072.chinese: 益食邑千三百戶，定食舞陽五千四百戶。
s0072.literal: 與信言未畢，上大驚曰：「吾國小，寧能容信？
s0072.idiomatic: Xiao He had not finished speaking when Gaozu exclaimed in great surprise: My realm is small—how can it contain a man like Han Xin?

s0073.chinese: 從，斬首百七十六級，虜二百八十八人。
s0073.idiomatic: If we want to contend for the world, there is no one else but Han Xin.

s0074.chinese: 別，破軍七，下城五，定郡六，縣五十二，得丞相一人，將軍十二人，二千石已下至三百石十一人。
s0074.literal: 乃拜信為大將軍，斬鐘離眜等七人東定齊。
s0074.idiomatic: He then appointed Han Xin as Grand General, executed Zhongli Mei and six others, and sent him east to pacify Qi.

s0075.chinese: 噲以呂后女弟呂須為婦，生子伉，故其比諸將最親。
s0075.idiomatic: When Qi territory was completely pacified, Han Xin was transferred to become King of Chu.

s0076.chinese: 先黥布反時，高祖嘗病甚，惡見人，臥禁中，詔戶者無得入群臣。
s0076.idiomatic: After Xiang Yu's death, Han Xin was transferred to become Marquis of Huaiyin.

s0077.literal: 信與絳侯等平陳豨、黥布等反，薨。
s0077.idiomatic: Han Xin joined Jiang Hou and others in suppressing the rebellions of Chen Xi and Ying Bu, then died.

s0078.chinese: 十餘日，噲乃排闥直入，大臣隨之。
s0078.idiomatic: His son Han Fei succeeded him, then died without heirs.

s0079.idiomatic: His younger brother Han Wei succeeded him as marquis.

s0080.chinese: 噲等見上流涕曰：「始陛下與臣等起豐沛，定天下，何其壯也！
s0080.idiomatic: When Wei died, his son Han Dan succeeded him.

s0081.idiomatic: When Dan died, his son Han Dai succeeded him.

s0082.chinese: 且陛下病甚，大臣震恐，不見臣等計事，顧獨與一宦者絕乎？
s0082.idiomatic: When Dai died, his son Han Jian succeeded him.

s0083.chinese: 且陛下獨不見趙高之事乎？」
s0083.idiomatic: When Jian died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0084.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Zhong succeeded him.

s0085.chinese: 其後盧綰反，高帝使噲以相國擊燕。
s0085.idiomatic: When Zhong died, his son Han Shu succeeded him.

s0086.chinese: 是時高帝病甚，人有惡噲黨於呂氏，即上一日宮車晏駕，則噲欲以兵盡誅滅戚氏、趙王如意之屬。
s0086.idiomatic: When Shu died, his son Han Xi succeeded him.

s0087.chinese: 高帝聞之大怒，乃使陳平載絳侯代將，而即軍中斬噲。
s0087.idiomatic: When Xi died, his son Han Qingji succeeded him.

s0088.chinese: 陳平畏呂后，執噲詣長安。
s0088.idiomatic: When Qingji died, his son Han Gong succeeded him.

s0089.chinese: 至則高祖已崩，呂后釋噲，使復爵邑。
s0089.idiomatic: When Gong died, his son Han Bing succeeded him.

s0090.chinese: 孝惠六年，樊噲卒，謚為武侯。
s0090.idiomatic: When Bing died, his son Han Gai succeeded him.

s0091.idiomatic: When Gai died, his son Han Hu succeeded him.

s0092.chinese: 而伉母呂須亦為臨光侯，高后時用事專權，大臣盡畏之。
s0092.idiomatic: When Hu died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0093.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Dang succeeded him.

s0094.chinese: 大臣誅諸呂、呂須婘屬，因誅伉。
s0094.idiomatic: When Dang died, his son Han Hui succeeded him.

s0095.idiomatic: When Hui died, his son Han Feng succeeded him.

s0096.chinese: 孝文帝既立，乃復封噲他庶子市人為舞陽侯，復故爵邑。
s0096.idiomatic: When Feng died, his son Han Zhang succeeded him.

s0097.chinese: 市人立二十九歲卒，謚為荒侯。
s0097.idiomatic: When Zhang died, his son Han Shi succeeded him.

s0098.idiomatic: When Shi died, his son Han Chang succeeded him.

s0099.chinese: 六歲，侯家舍人得罪他廣，怨之，乃上書曰：「荒侯市人病不能為人，令其夫人與其弟亂而生他廣，他廣實非荒侯子，不當代後。」
s0099.idiomatic: When Chang died, his son Han Chong succeeded him.

s0100.idiomatic: When Chong died, his son Han Heng succeeded him.
